title: "Unit 1: Introduction to Programming"
pagetitle: "{{< meta title >}} | {{< var title-fix >}}"
---

Unit 1 is essentially an introduction to the programming that you will be working with throughout the year. In this unit, you'll learn how to interact with sprites, how to create blocks, and iteration. In addition to these computational ideas, you'll learn about privacy in the physical and digital realm.
